name: Maxon Margiela
description: '''Mason Reyes''' (June 16, 2004 â€“ November 16, 2025), known professionally as '''Maxon Margiela''' or [[mononym|mononymously]] as '''Maxon''' (stylized in all lowercase), was an American rapper and songwriter from [[Orlando, Florida]]. He began making music professionally in 2024 and was known for his [[Gen-Z]] style of rap. He rose to prominence in late 2024 with the release of his singles "Austin Powers" and "Sexual Fantasies" featuring Percaso.
